actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2 of the act of August 22, 1964, to provide that articles which are produced or manufactured in Foreign-trade zones from foreign meat shall, upon their entry into the customs territory of the United States, be subject to certain import restriction.

summary.text: Imposes upon any articles produced in a "foreign-trade zone" from foreign meat the import restrictions which would be applicable to the meat had it entered the United States from its country of origin.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2 of the act of August 22, 1964, to provide that articles which are produced or manufactured in Foreign-trade zones from foreign meat shall, upon their entry into the customs territory of the United States, be subject to certain import restriction.
